entry.headline: IMAX(R) Theatres Post More Than $15 Million Globally for Disney's Alice in Wonderland...
entry.body: IMAX(R) Theatres Post More Than $15 Million Globally for Disney's Alice in Wonderland Opening Weekend IMAX Bests Previous Domestic Opening Weekend Record by More Than 25%; Virtual Sell-Out Throughout Network Momentum Continues With Tim Burton's Version of Classic Tale LOS ANGELES, March 8, 2010 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- IMAX Corporation (Nasdaq:IMAX) (TSX:IMX) today announced that Alice in Wonderland, directed by Tim Burton and starring Johnny Depp, Anne Hathaway and Mia Wasikowska, posted record opening weekend results, with 188 domestic IMAX(R) theatres contributing $12.1 million of the film's overall opening gross of an estimated $116.2 million during the weekend from Friday March 5 through Sunday March 7, which represents an approximate 27% increase over IMAX's previous opening weekend record. The IMAX release contributed approximately 10.5% of the overall domestic box on an estimated 2.5%of the total screens, and IMAX theatres posted a domestic per screen average of $64,362. Internationally, the film's IMAX release generated approximately $3.1 million from 53 IMAX theatres, bringing the global IMAX opening weekend total to $15.2 million. The film is scheduled to open day and date in 29 additional international IMAX theatres in the weeks ahead. The special IMAX(R) 3D release has been digitally re-mastered into the unparalleled image and sound quality of The IMAX Experience(R) with IMAX DMR(R) (Digital Re-Mastering) technology. "Disney delivered an amazing film perfectly suited for IMAX, and this record-breaking opening weekend demonstrates that new audiences are seeking out IMAX 3D," said IMAX CEO Richard L. Gelfond. "We're pleased to represent so much of the overall box office on an opening weekend of this magnitude, and these terrific results reaffirm our belief that the premium IMAX Experience -- and what our brand represents to consumers -- cannot be replicated, and we look forward to continued success in the weeks ahead." "We're off to a terrific start for 2010, and with the growing popularity and momentum of 3D, the timing of Alice in Wonderland is ideal, and the strong word of mouth should keep audiences filling IMAX theatres," added Greg Foster, Chairman and President of IMAX Filmed Entertainment. "The combination of Tim Burton's incredible creativity, Johnny Depp's universal appeal and the talented team at Disney has created a powerful 1-2-3 punch, and we're very excited that IMAX is a part of it." Visionary filmmaker Tim Burton has put his distinctive touch on the combination live-action and performance capture version of Lewis Carroll's classic tale "Alice in Wonderland." The all-star cast includes Johnny Depp, Anne Hathaway, Helena Bonham Carter, Crispin Glover, Alan Rickman and Mia Wasikowska as Alice. About IMAX Corporation IMAX Corporation is one of the world's leading entertainment technology companies, specializing in immersive motion picture technologies. The worldwide IMAX network is among the most important and successful theatrical distribution platforms for major event Hollywood films around the globe, with IMAX theatres delivering the world's best cinematic presentations using proprietary IMAX, IMAX 3D, and IMAX DMR(R) technology. IMAX DMR is the Company's groundbreaking digital re-mastering technology that allows it to digitally transform virtually any conventional motion picture into the unparalleled image and sound quality of The IMAX Experience. The IMAX brand is recognized throughout the world for extraordinary and immersive entertainment experiences for consumers. As of September 30, 2009, there were 403 IMAX theatres (280 commercial, 123 institutional) operating in 44 countries. IMAX(R), IMAX(R) 3D, IMAXDMR(R), Experience It In IMAX(R), AnIMAX 3D Experience(R) and The IMAX Experience(R) are trademarks of IMAX Corporation. More information about the Company can be found at www.imax.com. You may also connect with IMAX on Facebook (www.facebook.com/imax), Twitter (www.twitter.com/imax) and YouTube (www.youtube.com/imaxmovies). The IMAX Corporation logo is available at http://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/prs/?pkgid=6469 This press release contains forward looking statements that are based on management's assumptions and existing information and involve certain risks and uncertainties which could cause actual results to differ materially from future results expressed or implied by such forward looking statements. Important factors that could affect these statements include ongoing discussions with the SEC and OSC relating to their ongoing inquiries and the Company's accounting, the performance of films, the signing of theatre system agreements, the viability of new technologies, businesses and products, the timing of theatre system deliveries, the mix of theatre systems shipped, the timing of the recognition of revenues and expenses on film production and distribution agreements, risks arising from potential material weaknesses in internal control over financial reporting and fluctuations in foreign currency and in the large format, general commercial exhibition and out-of-home entertainment markets. These factors and other risks and uncertainties are discussed in the Company's most recent Annual Report on Form 10-K and most recent Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q. entry.headline: Level 3 werkt samen met SXSW aan eerste Live Stream van Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator programma ooit
entry.body: Level 3 levert Vyvx en CDN diensten tijdens SXSW interactief festival BROOMFIELD, Colorado--(Business Wire)-- Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) heeft vandaag bekendgemaakt dat het de eerste streaming ooit van een SXSW-event - de Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator - zal leveren op 15-16 maart. Met gebruikmaking van Level 3 Vyvx uitzenddiensten en het Level 3 content delivery network (CDN) gaat het bedrijf het event streamen zodat het live en op verzoek kan worden bekeken op de website van SXSW. Vanaf de ochtend van 15 maart zal Level 3 de feed van het Accelerator-event oppakken in het Hilton Austin Downtown, de content via de Level 3 CDN leveren en het event streamen met gebruikmaking van Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) Smooth Streaming en Microsoft Silverlight. Een link naar de stream zal beschikbaar zijn op http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. "Level 3 gelooft sterk in het belang van technologie-innovatie, dus werken met SXSW en Microsoft aan een event dat is ontworpen om nieuwe producten en diensten onder de aandacht te brengen was een ideale manier om dat geloof te ondersteunen en tegelijkertijd de kracht van Level 3`s Vyvx en CDN diensten onder de aandacht te brengen," aldus Peter Neill, senior vice president of Content Markets bij Level 3. "Door het leveren van een interactieve ervaring van hoge kwaliteit voor het wereldwijd onlinepubliek zullen we de schaal van dit event helpen verbreden en zorgen dat er een grotere gemeenschap ontstaat om ideeën gezamenlijk te gebruiken." Gedurende meer dan 20 jaar hebben Level 3`s Vyvx diensten missiekritieke uitzendcontent getransporteerd naar wereldwijde media-, reclame- en entertainmentklanten. Level 3`s Vyvx technologie, gecombineerd met het bereik van Level 3`s internationale Internet Protocol backbone en de mogelijkheden van hun CDN-platform, positioneren het bedrijf zodanig dat het werkelijke eind-tot-eind oplossingen levert aan klanten door hun content van ontstaan naar gebruik te begeleiden. "Ons werk met Level 3 zal helpen Accelerator beschikbaar te maken voor een geheel nieuw publiek - een spannend vooruitzicht voor zowel SXSW als de deelnemers aan de wedstrijd van dit jaar," aldus Katie King, Interactive Sales bij SXSW. "We zijn ons bewust van de uitstekende reputatie van Level 3 als het gaat om de levering van live-events en we hebben er alle vertrouwen in dat zij in staat zijn een uitstekende online kijkervaring te bieden." Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator bij SXSW, een twee dagen durende krachtmeting die plaatsvindt tijdens SXSW Interactive, is erop gericht om bedrijven de kans te geven geheel nieuwe of opkomende technologie, producten of diensten te laten zien aan een groot aantal brancheleiders. SXSW Interactive levert vijf dagen van presentaties van een aantal van de grootste experts op het gebied van opkomende technologie, netwerk-events gehost door brancheleiders en een aantal speciale programma`s met nieuwe websites, videogames en opstart-ideeën. Bezoek voor meer informatie over Level 3`s Vyvx en CDN diensten www.level3delivers.com. Bezoek voor meer informatie over SXSW en Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. Over Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) is een vooraanstaand internationaal leverancier van communicatiediensten. Ondernemingen, content-leveranciers, groothandelaren en overheidsinstanties vertrouwen op Level 3 voor het leveren van diensten met een brancheleidende combinatie van schaalbaarheid en waarde over een eind-tot-eind glasvezelnetwerk. Level 3 levert een portefeuille van metrodiensten en langeafstandsdiensten, waaronder transport, gegevens, internet, levering van content en spraakdiensten. Bezoek voor meer informatie www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. Alle rechten voorbehouden. Level 3, Vyvx, Level 3 Communications en het Level 3 Communications Logo zijn geregistreerde servicemerken of servicemerken van Level 3 Communications, LLC en/of een van hun gelieerde bedrijven in de Verenigde Staten en/of andere landen. Level 3 diensten worden verleend door 100% dochterbedrijven van Level 3 Communications, Inc. Andere namen van diensten, productnamen, bedrijfsnamen of logo`s die hierin zijn opgenomen zijn de handelsmerken of servicemerken van hun respectievelijke eigenaars. Forward-Looking Statement Enkele van de uitspraken in dit persbericht zijn van vooruitblikkende aard. Dergelijke uitspraken zijn gebaseerd op de huidige verwachtingen en meningen van het management. Deze forward-looking statements zijn geen garantie voor de prestaties en zijn onderhevig aan een aantal onzekerheden en andere factoren, waarvan vele buiten de macht van Level 3 liggen, die ervoor zouden kunnen zorgen dat werkelijke gebeurtenissen wezenlijk verschillen van wat is aangegeven of geïmpliceerd in deze uitspraken. De belangrijkste factoren die zouden kunnen voorkomen dat Level 3 de gestelde doelen behaalt, zijn onder andere de huidige onzekerheid op de financiële markten over de hele wereld en de wereldwijde economie, verstoringen van de financiële markten die het vermogen van Level 3 zouden kunnen verstoren om extra financieringen te verwerven, maar ook het vermogen van het bedrijf om: het verkeer op het netwerk te vergroten en te onderhouden; overgenomen bedrijven met succes te integreren; effectieve bedrijfsondersteuningssystemen te ontwikkelen; het intellectuele eigendom en eigendomsrechten te verdedigen; systeem- en netwerkfouten of storingen te verhelpen; nieuwe diensten te ontwikkelen die voldoen aan de eisen van de klanten en acceptabele marges te genereren; aanpassen aan snelle technologische veranderingen die leiden tot verdere concurrentie; gekwalificeerde managers en overig personeel aantrekken en behouden en te voldoen aan alle voorwaarden van schuldverplichtingen. Aanvullende informatie met betrekking tot deze en andere belangrijke factoren vindt u in de registraties van Level 3 bij de Securities and Exchange Commission. entry.headline: Level 3 s`associe à SXSW pour le tout premier streaming live du programme Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator
entry.body: Level 3 va fournir des services Vyvx et CDN au festival SXSW Interactive BROOMFIELD, Colorado--(Business Wire)-- La société Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ : LVLT) a annoncé aujourd`hui qu`elle allait assurer le tout premier streaming live d`un événement SXSW - Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator - du 15 au 16 mars. En utilisant ses services de diffusion Vyvx et son réseau de diffusion de contenu (CDN), Level 3 va transmettre l`événement en continu pour assurer une visualisation live et à la demande sur le site Web SXSW. À partir du 15 mars dans la matinée, Level 3 va capter l`événement Accelerator au Hilton Austin Downtown, diffuser le contenu sur son CDN et transmettre l`événement en continu à l`aide de Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) Smooth Streaming et de Microsoft Silverlight. Un lien au flux sera disponible sur http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. « Level 3 croit fermement en l`importance de l`innovation technologique, et par conséquent, le fait de collaborer avec SXSW et Microsoft sur un événement conçu pour sensibiliser le public à de nouveaux produits et services, était un moyen idéal de soutenir cette conviction tout en mettant en vedette la puissance des services Vyvx et CDN de Level 3 », a déclaré Peter Neill, vice-président senior des marchés Contenu chez Level 3. « En offrant une expérience interactive de haute qualité à une audience en ligne mondiale, nous allons élargir l`envergure de cet événement et promouvoir une plus grande communauté de partage d`idées. » Depuis plus de 20 ans, les services Vyvx de Level 3 transportent un contenu de diffusion essentiel à la mission destiné à des clients des médias, de la publicité et des divertissements. La technologie Vyvx de Level 3, alliée à la portée de sa dorsale Internet Protocol internationale et aux capacités de sa plateforme CDN, permet à la société de fournir de vraies solutions de bout en bout aux clients, en portant leur contenu de sa création à sa consommation. « Notre collaboration avec Level 3 va permettre d`offrir Accelerator à une toute nouvelle audience - une perspective excitante tant pour SXSW que pour les participants à la compétition de cette année », a commenté Katie King, ventes interactives chez SXSW. « Nous connaissons les excellents résultats obtenus par Level 3 en diffusion d`événements live, et nous avons confiance en sa capacité à offrir une expérience de visualisation en ligne exceptionnelle. » Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator à SXSW, une compétition de deux jours organisée dans le cadre de SXSW Interactive, a pour but de donner aux entreprises l`occasion de présenter une technologie, des produits ou des services d`avant-garde ou émergents à une foule de leaders du secteur. SXSW Interactive propose cinq jours de présentations par certains des cerveaux les plus brillants dans le domaine de la technologie émergente, des événements de mise en réseau offerts par des leaders du secteur et un éventail de programmes spéciaux illustrant de nouveaux sites Web et jeux vidéo et des idées de startup. Pour en savoir plus sur les services Vyvx et CDN de Level 3, veuillez consulter le site www.level3delivers.com. Pour en savoir plus sur SXSW et Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator, veuillez consulter le site www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. À propos de Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ : LVLT) est un chef de file international dans la prestation de services de communication sur fibres. Des entreprises, des sociétés de diffusion de contenu, des grossistes et des services publics comptent sur Level 3 pour fournir des services de premier plan, évolutifs et économiques sur un réseau de fibres optiques de bout en bout. Level 3 propose un catalogue de services urbains et longue distance comprenant le transport, la transmission de données, Internet, la livraison de contenus et la transmission vocale. Pour de plus amples informations, consultez le site www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. Tous droits réservés. Level 3, Vyvx, « de la création à la consommation », Level 3 Communications et le logo Level 3 Communications sont soit des marques de services déposées, soit des marques de service de Level 3 Communications, LLC et/ou d`une de ses filiales aux États-Unis et/ou dans d`autres pays. Les services Level 3 sont fournis par des filiales à 100 % de Level 3 Communications, Inc. Tous les autres noms de service, produit, société ou logos figurant dans les présentes sont des marques de commerce ou des marques de service de leurs détenteurs respectifs. Énoncé prospectif Certaines des déclarations émises dans le présent communiqué de presse sont par nature des énoncés prospectifs. Ces énoncés se basent sur les prévisions et convictions actuelles de la direction. Ces énoncés prospectifs ne sont pas une garantie de performance et ils sont soumis à un certain nombre d`incertitudes et à d`autres facteurs, dont beaucoup échappent au contrôle de Level 3. Ces facteurs peuvent entraîner un écart considérable entre les événements réels et ceux exprimés ou sous-entendus dans les déclarations du présent communiqué. Les facteurs les plus importants pouvant empêcher Level 3 d`atteindre ses objectifs déclarés comprennent, entre autres, l`incertitude actuelle qui règne sur les marchés financiers internationaux et dans l`économie mondiale ; les perturbations des marchés financiers susceptibles de nuire à la capacité de Level 3 d`obtenir des financements supplémentaires ; ainsi que la capacité qu`a la société à : augmenter et maintenir le volume de trafic sur son réseau ; réussir l`intégration de ses acquisitions ; mettre au point des systèmes efficaces de soutien aux activités ; défendre sa propriété intellectuelle et ses droits exclusifs ; gérer des pannes ou interruptions de système et de réseau ; développer de nouveaux services répondant aux exigences des clients et générer des marges acceptables ; s`adapter à la rapide évolution des technologies qui entraîne plus de concurrence ; attirer et conserver une équipe de direction et autres collaborateurs qualifiés ; et répondre aux termes et conditions de ses obligations financières. Des informations supplémentaires concernant ces facteurs importants et d`autres facteurs peuvent être consultées dans les dossiers déposés par Level 3 auprès de la Securities and Exchange Commission (commission américaine de contrôle des opérations boursières). Les déclarations du présent communiqué de presse doivent être évaluées à la lumière de ces facteurs importants. Level 3 se dégage de toute responsabilité concernant la mise à jour ou la révision de tout énoncé prospectif, que ce soit à la suite de nouvelles informations, d`événements futurs ou pour d`autres raisons. Le texte du communiqué issu d`une traduction ne doit d`aucune manière être considéré comme officiel. La seule version du communiqué qui fasse foi est celle du communiqué dans sa langue d`origine. La traduction devra toujours être confrontée au texte source, qui fera jurisprudence. Level 3 Communications, Inc. entry.headline: Level 3 se asocia con SXSW para la primera retransmisión por Internet de la historia del programa BizSpark Accelerator de Microsoft
entry.body: Level 3 ofrecerá los servicios de Vyvx y CDN durante el Festival SXSW Interactivo BROOMFIELD (Colorado)--(Business Wire)-- Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) anunció hoy que ofrecerá la primera retransmisión por Internet de la historia de un evento de SXSW: el BizSpark Accelerator de Microsoft, el 15 y el 16 de marzo. Utilizando los servicios de retransmisión Vyvx Level 3 y la red para entrega de contenidos (CDN, por sus siglas en inglés) de Level 3, la empresa retransmitirá el evento para su visualización en directo y bajo demanda por Internet en la página web de SXSW. Level 3 captará la señal del evento Accelerator que comenzará el 15 marzo por la mañana en el Hilton Austin Downtown, ofrecerá los contenidos por CDN de Level 3 y retransmitirá el evento utilizando los servicios de información de Internet de Microsoft (ISS, por sus siglas en inglés) Smooth Streaming y Microsoft Silverlight. Habrá disponible un enlace a la retransmisión en http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. "Level 3 cree firmemente en la importancia de la innovación tecnológica, y por lo tanto trabajar con SXSW y Microsoft en un evento diseñado para crear concienciación sobre nuevos productos y servicios es una manera ideal de apoyar esa creencia al tiempo que mostramos la potencia de los servicios Vyvx y CDN de Level 3", afirma Peter Nelly, vicepresidente de mercados de contenidos de Level 3. "Al ofrecer una experiencia interactiva de alta calidad para el público global de Internet, ayudaremos a ampliar la escala de este evento y animaremos a que una comunidad más grande comparta ideas". Durante más de 20 años, los servicios Vyvx de Level 3 han transportado contenidos de emisión de misión crítica a los medios de comunicación globales, publicidad y clientes de entretenimiento. La tecnología Vyvx de Level 3, combinada con el alcance de la columna vertebral del protocolo de Internet internacional de Level 3 y las capacidades de su plataforma CDN, colocan a la empresa en situación de ofrecer soluciones reales extremo a extremo a los clientes, llevando su contenido desde su creación a su consumo. "Nuestro trabajo con Level 3 ayudará a llevar Accelerator a un público completamente nuevo: se trata de una perspectiva apasionante tanto para SXSW como para los participantes del concurso de este año", afirma Katie King, de ventas interactivas de SXSW. "Somos conscientes de la excelente trayectoria histórica de Level 3 en la retransmsión de eventos en directo y confiamos en su capacidad para ofrecer una magnífica experiencia de visualización por Internet". El BizSpark Accelerator de Microsoft en SXSW, un concurso de dos días de duración que tiene lugar durante SXSW Interactive tiene por objetivo dar a las empresas la oportunidad de mostrar tecnologías pioneras o emergentes, productos o servicios a una multitud de líderes de la industria. SXSW Interactive consta de cinco días de exposiciones en las que participan algunas de las mentes más brillantes de la tecnología emergente, eventos de redes que organizan líderes de la industria y una serie de programas especiales que presentan nuevas páginas web, juegos de video y nuevas ideas. Para mayor información sobre los servicios Vyvx y CDN de Level 3 visite www.level3delivers.com. Para averiguar más acerca de SXSW y BizSpark Accelerator de Microsoft, visite www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. Acerca de Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ: LVLT) es proveedor internacional líder de servicios de comunicaciones basadas en la fibra óptica. Los clientes empresariales, de contenidos, de venta al por mayor y gubernamentales confían en Level 3 para ofrecer servicios con una combinación líder en la industria de escalabilidad y valor por una red de fibra de extremo a extremo. Level 3 ofrece una cartera de servicios metropolitanos y de gran alcance que incluyen transporte, datos, internet, difusión de contenido y voz. Para obtener más información visite www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. Reservados todos los derechos. Vyvx, "from creation to consumption" (de la creación al consumo), Level 3 Communications y el logotipo de Level 3 Communications son marcas de servicio registradas o marcas de servicio de Level 3 Communications, LLC y/o de sus afiliadas en los Estados Unidos y/o en otros países. Los servicios de Level 3 los ofrecen subsidiarias de propiedad completa de Level 3 Communications, Inc. Cualesquiera otros nombres de servicio, nombres de productos, nombres o logotipos de empresas incluidos en el presente son marcas registradas o marcas de servicio de sus propietarios respectivos. Declaración prospectiva Ciertas declaraciones de este comunicado son prospectivas en su naturaleza. Estas declaraciones se basan en las expectativas o creencias actuales de la dirección. Estas declaraciones prospectivas no son una garantía de rendimiento, y están sujetas a una serie de incertidumbres y a otros factores, muchos de ellos fuera del control de Level 3, que podrían causar que los resultados reales difieran materialmente de los expresados o implícitos por la declaración. Los factores más importantes que podrían evitar que Level 3 alcance sus objetivos marcados incluyen, entre otros, la actual incertidumbre de los mercados financieros globales y de la economía global; los trastornos de los mercados financieros que podrían afectar la capacidad de Level 3 para obtener financiación adicional, así como la capacidad de la compañía para: aumentar y mantener el volumen de tráfico en la red; integrar con éxito las adquisiciones; desarrollar sistemas efectivos de apoyo a negocios; defender la propiedad intelectual y los derechos de propiedad; controlar los fallos o interrupciones de la red y de los sistemas; desarrollar nuevos servicios que satisfagan las exigencias de los clientes y generen márgenes aceptables; adaptarse rápidamente a los cambios tecnológicos que generan una mayor competencia; atraer y retener una dirección cualificada y otro personal, y cumplir todas las condiciones y términos de las obligaciones de deudas. Hay disponible información adicional sobre estos y otros factores importantes en los documentos de Level 3 presentados ante la Securities and Exchange Commission (Comisión del Mercado de Valores estadounidense). Las declaraciones de este comunicado deben ser evaluadas a la luz de estos importantes factores. Level 3 no tiene la obligación de, y rechaza expresamente cualquier obligación de, actualizar o alterar sus declaraciones prospectivas, ya sea como resultado de nueva información, futuros eventos u otros. El comunicado en el idioma original, es la versión oficial y autorizada del mismo. La traducción es solamente un medio de ayuda y deberá ser comparada con el texto en idioma original, que es la única versión del texto que tendrá validez legal. Level 3 Communications, Inc. entry.headline: Navios Maritime Partners L.P. to Present at J.P. Morgan Aviation, Transportation & Defense Conference in New York
entry.body: PIRAEUS, GREECE, Mar 08 (MARKET WIRE) -- Navios Maritime Partners L.P. ("Navios Partners") (NYSE: NMM), an owner and operator of dry cargo vessels, announced today that members of its management team will be presenting at the J.P. Morgan Aviation, Transportation & Defense Conference. The Conference will be held in New York City on March 9 & 10, 2010. Navios Partners is scheduled to present on Wednesday, March 10, 2009 at 8:00 am EST. A live and then archived audio webcast of Navios Maritime Partners' presentation will be available at http://metameetings.com/webcasts/jpmorgan/aviation10/directlink?ticker=NMM. A PDF version of the slide presentation used at the conference will also be available on the website of Navios Partners at www.navios-mlp.com in the Investor Relations section. About Navios Maritime Partners L.P. Navios Maritime Partners L.P. (NYSE: NMM), a publicly traded master limited partnership formed by Navios Maritime Holdings Inc (NYSE: NM) is an owner and operator of dry cargo vessels. For more information, please visit its website at www.navios-mlp.com Forward Looking Statements This press release contains forward-looking statements (as defined in Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended) concerning future events and Navios Partners' growth strategy and measures to implement such strategy; including expected vessel acquisitions and entering into further time charters. entry.headline: Amazon Defense Coalition:Chevron Faces Critical Hearing over Ecuador Rainforest Contamination in New York Federal Court
entry.body: Oil Giant Charged With Forum Shopping and Violating Promises to Litigate Claims in Ecuador (Chevron`s hearing is scheduled for 2 p.m. on March 10 before Judge Leonard B. Sand in courtroom 15A of the United States Courthouse at 500 Pearl St. in Manhattan.) NEW YORK--(Business Wire)-- Chevron will be forced to explain to a U.S. federal judge this Wednesday why it believes it has the right to take the seven-year Ecuador environmental case (Aguinda v. ChevronTexaco) to a closed-door binding arbitration where the rainforest communities cannot appear, in apparent violation of the company`s previous promises that it would litigate the case in its requested forum of Ecuador. The trial judge in the environmental case - where Chevron faces damages of up to $27 billion for allegedly poisoning an area the size of Rhode Island -- has yet to rule in what experts believe is one of the most extensively litigated environmental trials ever. Because Chevron expects to lose the trial due to indisputable scientific evidence proving extensive contamination, it is trying to use the arbitration to force Ecuador`s government to quash the case before it can end, according to representatives of the rainforest communities. Chevron is trying to abandon the trial even though over the last seven years the parties have produced more than 64,000 chemical sampling results, conducted 103 court-supervised inspections of former Chevron well sites scattered throughout the rainforest, and created a trial record than runs to more than 200,000 pages. "Chevron acts like a fugitive from justice in Ecuador because the evidence establishing the company`s misconduct is overwhelming," said Jonathon Abady, an American lawyer representing the rainforest communities in the federal court action. "We plan to explain to the court that Chevron has no legal basis for the arbitration and is engaging in blatant forum shopping to avoid responsibility for an environmental disaster," added Abady, of the law firm Emery, Celli, Brinckerhoff & Abady in New York City. The hearing before Judge Sand will examine whether Chevron should be enjoined from initiating a private arbitration against Ecuador`s government under the U.S.-Ecuador Bilateral Investment Treaty. In what the plaintiffs describe as a "radical" maneuver that undermines the rule of law, Chevron claims the trade treaty gives it the right to force Ecuador`s government to order its courts to extinguish the Aguinda case on the grounds Chevron has been treated unfairly in the trial even though Chevron has yet to actually lose. The arbitration is Chevron`s primary attempt to "escape" from an adverse judgment in Ecuador that would significantly increase its financial exposure, said Illann Maazel, who is litigating the case with Abady. "Chevron is contriving the argument it is being treated unfairly to avoid its legal obligations," he said. The Aguinda plaintiffs and the government of Ecuador have filed separate petitions with the New York court claiming there is no legal basis for Chevron`s hoped-for arbitration because it violates the company`s earlier promises to the same court to subject itself to jurisdiction in Ecuador and abide by any judgment there. The promises induced the U.S. court to transfer the case to Ecuador in 2002 over the objections of the rainforest communities, who had filed their action in the U.S. in 1993. From 1993 to 2002, Chevron submitted 14 sworn affidavits to the U.S. court praising Ecuador`s judicial system in an effort to induce the court to transfer the case to the South American nation. After Chevron won the battle over venue, the plaintiffs re-filed the lawsuit in Ecuador in 2003 only to find on the first day of trial that Chevron tried to fight jurisdiction in violation of its earlier promises to the U.S. judge. In 2004, as the evidence against it mounted, Chevron initiated a previous arbitration against Ecuador`s government claiming it should bear all liability in the case. In 2007, Judge Sand (the same judge presiding over the hearing on March 10) permanently stayed Chevron`s first attempt at arbitration. Chevron also lost unanimously on appeal and the U.S. Supreme Court rejected its petition for review. The plaintiffs plan to tell the court that Chevron is violating the rule of law by trying to again start an arbitration that essentially will hijack their claims into another court where they cannot appear, said Maazel. "Chevron apparently thinks it is above the law and therefore does not need to be held accountable in any public court," said Maazel. "But no company should be allowed to evade accountability for an egregious wrong just because it has an unlimited budget to litigate the same issues endlessly." The Aguinda lawsuit charges that Texaco (which Chevron bought in 2001) created a system of oil extraction in the Amazon rainforest that deliberately discharged billions of gallons of toxic wastewater into streams and rivers and abandoned more than 900 unlined waste pits filled with toxic sludge. In 2008, a Special Master appointed by the Ecuador court found that the pollution had caused 1,401 excess cancer deaths and decimated indigenous groups, leading to a host of oil-related illnesses. About the Amazon Defense Coalition The Amazon Defense Coalition represents dozens of rainforest communities and five indigenous groups that inhabit Ecuador`s Northern Amazon region. The mission of the Coalition is to protect the environment and secure social justice through grass roots organizing, political advocacy, and litigation. Two of its leaders, Luis Yanza and Pablo Fajardo, are the 2008 winners of the prestigious Goldman Environmental Prize. Amazon Defense Coalition Karen Hinton, 703-798-3109 karen@hintoncommunications.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.headline: Joseph B. Leonard Named Interim Chief Executive Officer of Walter Energy
entry.body: TAMPA, FL, Mar 08 (MARKET WIRE) -- Walter Energy (NYSE: WLT), a leading U.S. producer and exporter of premium hard coking coal for the global steel industry, today announced that its Board of Directors has named Board Member Joseph B. Leonard, former chairman and chief executive officer of AirTran Holdings, as its interim chief executive officer. "Joe has been an important member of our board, serving with us in two separate tenures," said Michael T. Tokarz, chairman of Walter Energy. "We will look to him to provide continuity and leadership, keeping the company on its path as a leading provider of premium coking coal for the global steel industry. Joe also will be responsible for directing our search for a permanent CEO and filling out our senior management team." In addition to his seat on the Walter Energy board, Leonard also is on the board of directors of Mueller Water Products, Inc., a former subsidiary of the Company, and Air Canada. Mr. Leonard succeeds Victor P. Patrick, who announced his retirement on Feb. 22, 2010. The effective date of the transition will be close of business March 12, 2010. "We sincerely appreciate Vic's service to the Company over the past eight years. He has served in a number of important roles during his tenure, most recently as our chief executive officer, chief financial officer and general counsel. His leadership over that time was integral to our Company's transformation and our success. We wish him and his family the best in the future," said Tokarz. The Company also announced that Sr. Vice President - Controller Lisa A. Honnold will serve as interim chief financial officer and that Catherine C. Bona, currently vice president, assistant general counsel and secretary, will serve as interim general counsel. These appointments are also effective close of business March 12, 2010. Ms. Honnold continues to serve as senior vice president - controller of the Company, a role she has held since March 2006. She had previously served as vice president of corporate accounting for the Company since December 2005. Prior to joining Walter Energy, she was vice president, corporate controller of Catalina Marketing Corporation from December 2004 to November 2005, holding the previous title of assistant controller since November 2003. She had previously held various positions with NACCO Industries, Inc., last serving as manager of financial reporting and analysis. Honnold is a certified public accountant and received a B.S. Degree in Accountancy from Miami University. Ms. Bona was appointed vice president, assistant general counsel and secretary for the Company in April 2007. She had previously served as assistant general counsel and assistant secretary and has been with the Company since 1995. Bona holds a law degree from St. Johns University School of Law and a Bachelor's Degree from LeMoyne College in Syracuse, NY. She is a member of the Florida, New York and Pennsylvania State Bar Associations and also holds memberships in the American Bar Association, the Association of Corporate Counsel and the Society of Corporate Secretaries and Governance Professionals. "Both Lisa and Cathy have been important components of the Company's success," Tokarz added. "The board and I have confidence that they will continue to be outstanding contributors in these interim leadership roles until such time that permanent replacements are named." About Walter Energy Walter Energy is a leading U.S. producer and exporter of premium hard coking coal for the global steel industry and also produces steam coal and industrial coal, metallurgical coke and coal bed methane gas. The Company has revenues of approximately $1.0 billion and employs approximately 2,100 people. For more information about Walter Energy, please visit the Company Web site at www.walterenergy.com. entry.author: None
entry.headline: Visara Announces the CNA-8000, a Channel Attached Alternative to Cisco Routers with CIP`s, IBM 3172 and 2216 Gateways
entry.body: MORRISVILLE, N.C.--(Business Wire)-- Visara International announces the CNA-8000 Channel Network Appliance, a channel attached gateway communications platform that provides a robust alternative to Cisco Routers with Channel Interface Processors (CIP`s), IBM 3172 and 2216 gateways. The CNA-8000 can be configured to provide gateway functions for TN3270 clients, SNA PU2 traffic, and TCP/IP traffic. The CNA-8000 host connectivity is provided through single or dual ESCON interfaces. Each ESCON interface supports up to 16 control unit images and 256 sub channels. Network connectivity is provided by a pair of integrated 10/100/1000 Mbps Ethernet interfaces. Additional capacity can be optionally provided by one additional quad 10/100/1000 Mbps Ethernet interface. The CNA-8000 may also be equipped with one or more 4/16/100 Mbps Token Ring adapters. Each network interface can be configured to support TCP/IP and/or LLC2 SNA, and/or TN3270E traffic. The CNA-8000 Channel Network Appliance consists of an enterprise class 3U rack mountable server platform running Linux software. The server is equipped with dual RAID drives, three hot swappable power supplies and several hot swappable fans. According to Visara International's CEO Dr. Kenneth A. Bloom: "IBM and Cisco decided to end their production and support for 3172, 2216 and CIP, leaving customers without an adequate replacement until the CNA-8000." The CNA-8000 can be configured to support up to 8,192 TN3270E capable clients. Up to 2048 downstream PU2.0 and PU2.1 platforms are supported through each network interface when configured as an SNA PU2 gateway. Configured as an IP bridge, the CNA-8000 provides bridging of IP traffic between configured network interfaces and the channel interface for access to the TCP/IP stack. Support for VM/VSE environments is supported with appropriately installed IP stacks. Configuration and management of the CNA-8000 can be through a browser interface or through direct attachment of a monitor, keyboard and mouse. Additional management options are offered through Visara`s eManager product. Headquartered near Research Triangle Park, North Carolina, Avenir Technologies Inc. d/b/a Visara International is a global leader in the innovation and development of mainframe and midrange console solutions, Console Automation solutions, Virtual Tape Library and Printing Solutions. For additional information about Visara International's products and solutions, please visit our website at www.visara.com or email info@visara.com. Visara International Robert Caserta, 919-882-0220 caserta@visara.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Pfizer Animal Health Welcomes Agreement with Elanco on Divested European Assets
entry.body: PARIS--(Business Wire)-- Pfizer Animal Health today welcomed the signing of an agreement between Pfizer and Elanco, the animal health business unit of Eli Lilly and Company, under which Elanco will acquire European rights to a portfolio of certain Pfizer Animal Health and legacy Fort Dodge Animal Health products. The divestiture of these products is in connection with the regulatory approval process associated with Pfizer`s acquisition of Wyeth, including Fort Dodge Animal Health, which was completed on October 15, 2009. Completion of the transaction with Elanco is contingent upon approval by European regulatory authorities and other closing conditions. "This divestiture follows Pfizer`s acquisition of Wyeth that furthered our commitment to the industry by providing even more comprehensive treatment options across the animal health market," said Albert Bourla, Pfizer Animal Health Area President of Europe, Africa, Asia and Pacific Region. "We are continuing to build a new Pfizer Animal Health in Europe by delivering a product portfolio across all species, investing in innovation and new partnerships, and extending our Value Added Services program." Under the terms of the agreement, Elanco will acquire European rights to a portfolio of products previously marketed by Pfizer Animal Health and Fort Dodge Animal Health, including vaccines, parasiticides and feed additives, that are used in both food production animal and companion animal segments, as well as a Fort Dodge biologicals manufacturing facility in Sligo, Ireland. All current Sligo employees are expected to transfer to the new company. In order to ensure an uninterrupted supply of product to customers, both companies have also signed corresponding manufacturing supply agreements for certain products. No other terms of the transaction were disclosed. About Pfizer Animal Health Pfizer Animal Health, a business of Pfizer Inc, is a world leader in animal health, committed to providing high-quality, innovative health products, including pharmaceuticals and biologicals, for livestock and companion animals in more than 60 countries. Pfizer Animal Health employs more than 5,000 colleagues including more than 800 dedicated to Research and Development. Garnett Keeler Public Relations Mike Keeler +44 (0)20 8647 4467 pr@garnett-keeler.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Chevron Faces Critical Hearing over Ecuador Rainforest Contamination in New York Federal Court
entry.body: Oil Giant Charged With Forum Shopping and Violating Promises to Litigate Claims in Ecuador (Chevron`s hearing is scheduled for 2 p.m. on March 10 before Judge Leonard B. Sand in courtroom 15A of the United States Courthouse at 500 Pearl St. in Manhattan.) NEW YORK--(Business Wire)-- Chevron will be forced to explain to a U.S. federal judge this Wednesday why it believes it has the right to take the seven-year Ecuador environmental case (Aguinda v. ChevronTexaco) to a closed-door binding arbitration where the rainforest communities cannot appear, in apparent violation of the company`s previous promises that it would litigate the case in its requested forum of Ecuador. The trial judge in the environmental case - where Chevron faces damages of up to $27 billion for allegedly poisoning an area the size of Rhode Island -- has yet to rule in what experts believe is one of the most extensively litigated environmental trials ever. Because Chevron expects to lose the trial due to indisputable scientific evidence proving extensive contamination, it is trying to use the arbitration to force Ecuador`s government to quash the case before it can end, according to representatives of the rainforest communities. Chevron is trying to abandon the trial even though over the last seven years the parties have produced more than 64,000 chemical sampling results, conducted 103 court-supervised inspections of former Chevron well sites scattered throughout the rainforest, and created a trial record than runs to more than 200,000 pages. "Chevron acts like a fugitive from justice in Ecuador because the evidence establishing the company`s misconduct is overwhelming," said Jonathon Abady, an American lawyer representing the rainforest communities in the federal court action. "We plan to explain to the court that Chevron has no legal basis for the arbitration and is engaging in blatant forum shopping to avoid responsibility for an environmental disaster," added Abady, of the law firm Emery, Celli, Brinckerhoff & Abady in New York City. The hearing before Judge Sand will examine whether Chevron should be enjoined from initiating a private arbitration against Ecuador`s government under the U.S.-Ecuador Bilateral Investment Treaty. In what the plaintiffs describe as a "radical" maneuver that undermines the rule of law, Chevron claims the trade treaty gives it the right to force Ecuador`s government to order its courts to extinguish the Aguinda case on the grounds Chevron has been treated unfairly in the trial even though Chevron has yet to actually lose. The arbitration is Chevron`s primary attempt to "escape" from an adverse judgment in Ecuador that would significantly increase its financial exposure, said Illann Maazel, who is litigating the case with Abady. "Chevron is contriving the argument it is being treated unfairly to avoid its legal obligations," he said. The Aguinda plaintiffs and the government of Ecuador have filed separate petitions with the New York court claiming there is no legal basis for Chevron`s hoped-for arbitration because it violates the company`s earlier promises to the same court to subject itself to jurisdiction in Ecuador and abide by any judgment there. The promises induced the U.S. court to transfer the case to Ecuador in 2002 over the objections of the rainforest communities, who had filed their action in the U.S. in 1993. From 1993 to 2002, Chevron submitted 14 sworn affidavits to the U.S. court praising Ecuador`s judicial system in an effort to induce the court to transfer the case to the South American nation. After Chevron won the battle over venue, the plaintiffs re-filed the lawsuit in Ecuador in 2003 only to find on the first day of trial that Chevron tried to fight jurisdiction in violation of its earlier promises to the U.S. judge. In 2004, as the evidence against it mounted, Chevron initiated a previous arbitration against Ecuador`s government claiming it should bear all liability in the case. In 2007, Judge Sand (the same judge presiding over the hearing on March 10) permanently stayed Chevron`s first attempt at arbitration. Chevron also lost unanimously on appeal and the U.S. Supreme Court rejected its petition for review. The plaintiffs plan to tell the court that Chevron is violating the rule of law by trying to again start an arbitration that essentially will hijack their claims into another court where they cannot appear, said Maazel. "Chevron apparently thinks it is above the law and therefore does not need to be held accountable in any public court," said Maazel. "But no company should be allowed to evade accountability for an egregious wrong just because it has an unlimited budget to litigate the same issues endlessly." The Aguinda lawsuit charges that Texaco (which Chevron bought in 2001) created a system of oil extraction in the Amazon rainforest that deliberately discharged billions of gallons of toxic wastewater into streams and rivers and abandoned more than 900 unlined waste pits filled with toxic sludge. In 2008, a Special Master appointed by the Ecuador court found that the pollution had caused 1,401 excess cancer deaths and decimated indigenous groups, leading to a host of oil-related illnesses. About the Amazon Defense Coalition The Amazon Defense Coalition represents dozens of rainforest communities and five indigenous groups that inhabit Ecuador`s Northern Amazon region. The mission of the Coalition is to protect the environment and secure social justice through grass roots organizing, political advocacy, and litigation. Two of its leaders, Luis Yanza and Pablo Fajardo, are the 2008 winners of the prestigious Goldman Environmental Prize. Amazon Defense Coalition Karen Hinton, 703-798-3109 karen@hintoncommunications.com Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.headline: SFL - J.P. Morgan Aviation & Transportation Conference
entry.body: HAMILTON, NORWAY, Mar 08 (MARKET WIRE) -- Press release from Ship Finance International Limited March 8, 2010 Ship Finance International Limited (NYSE: SFL) ("Ship Finance" or "SFL") today announced that Ole B. Hjertaker, CEO, will present at the J.P. Morgan Aviation & Transportation Conference. The presentation will take place on March 10, 2010 at 11:15 AM Eastern Daylight Time. A live audio webcast of the presentation can be found at the following link: http://metameetings.com/webcasts/jpmorgan/aviation10/directlink?ticker=SFL The link to the audio webcast will be live just prior to the start of the presentation. A replay of the audio webcast will be available through our website http://www.shipfinance.org for a period of 90 days. About Ship Finance Ship Finance is a major ship owning company listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: SFL). Including newbuildings, the Company has a fleet of 69 vessels, including 32 crude oil tankers (VLCC and Suezmax), two chemical tankers, eight oil/bulk/ore vessels, eight dry-bulk carriers, 9 container vessels, six offshore supply vessels, one jack-up drilling rig and three ultra-deepwater drilling units. The fleet is one of the largest in the world and most of the vessels are employed on long-term charters. The Company has declared a cash dividend for 24 consecutive quarters. More information can be found on the Company's website: www.shipfinance.org Cautionary Statement Regarding Forward Looking Statements This press release may contain forward looking statements. These statements are based upon various assumptions, many of which are based, in turn, upon further assumptions, including Ship Finance management's examination of historical operating trends. Although Ship Finance believes that these assumptions were reasonable when made, because assumptions are inherently subject to significant uncertainties and contingencies which are difficult or impossible to predict and are beyond its control, Ship Finance cannot give assurance that it will achieve or accomplish these expectations, beliefs or intentions. Important factors that, in the Company's view, could cause actual results to differ materially from those discussed in this presentation include the strength of world economies and currencies, general market conditions including fluctuations in charter hire rates and vessel values, changes in demand in the tanker market as a result of changes in OPEC's petroleum production levels and world wide oil consumption and storage, changes in the Company's operating expenses including bunker prices, dry-docking and insurance costs, changes in governmental rules and regulations or actions taken by regulatory authorities, potential liability from pending or future litigation, general domestic and international political conditions, potential disruption of shipping routes due to accidents or political events, and other important factors described from time to time in the reports filed by the Company with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission. [HUG#1391718] Ole Hjertaker (CFO) +47 23 11 40 00 Copyright 2010, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Level 3 Teams up With SXSW for First-Ever Live Stream of Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator Program
entry.body: Level 3 to Deliver Vyvx and CDN Services During SXSW Interactive Festival BROOMFIELD, Colo.--(Business Wire)-- Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) today announced it will provide the first-ever live streaming of an SXSW event - the Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator - on March 15-16. Using Level 3 Vyvx broadcast services and the Level 3 content delivery network (CDN), the company will stream the event for live and on-demand online viewing on the SXSW Web site. Starting the morning of March 15, Level 3 will take the feed from the Accelerator event at the Hilton Austin Downtown, deliver the content over the Level 3 CDN and stream the event using Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) Smooth Streaming and Microsoft Silverlight. A link to the stream will be available at http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. "Level 3 is a strong believer in the importance of technology innovation, so working with SXSW and Microsoft on an event designed to build awareness for new products and services was an ideal way to support that belief while showcasing the power of Level 3`s Vyvx and CDN services," said Peter Neill, senior vice president of Content Markets at Level 3. "By providing a high-quality interactive experience for the global online audience, we will help broaden the scale of this event and foster a larger community for sharing ideas." For more than 20 years, Level 3`s Vyvx services have transported mission critical broadcast content to global media, advertising and entertainment customers. Level 3`s Vyvx technology, combined with the reach of Level 3`s international Internet Protocol backbone and the capabilities of its CDN platform, position the company to provide true end-to-end solutions to customers, taking their content from its creation to consumption. "Our work with Level 3 will help bring Accelerator to an entirely new audience - an exciting prospect for both SXSW and the participants in this year`s contest," said Katie King, Interactive Sales at SXSW. "We`re aware of Level 3`s strong track record for delivering live events, and we`re confident in their ability to provide an outstanding online viewing experience." Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator at SXSW, a two-day contest that takes place during SXSW Interactive, is aimed at giving companies the opportunity to showcase pioneering or emerging technology, products or services to a crowd of industry leaders. SXSW Interactive features five days of presentations from some of the brightest minds in emerging technology, networking events hosted by industry leaders and a line-up of special programs showcasing new websites, video games and startup ideas. For more information on Level 3`s Vyvx and CDN services, please visit www.level3delivers.com. To learn more about SXSW and Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator, visit www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. About Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) is a leading international provider of fiber-based communications services. Enterprise, content, wholesale and government customers rely on Level 3 to deliver services with an industry-leading combination of scalability and value over an end-to-end fiber network. Level 3 offers a portfolio of metro and long-haul services, including transport, data, Internet, content delivery and voice. For more information, visit www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. All Rights Reserved. Level 3, Vyvx, "from creation to consumption", Level 3 Communications and the Level 3 Communications Logo are either registered service marks or service marks of Level 3 Communications, LLC and/or one of its Affiliates in the United States and/or other countries. Level 3 services are provided by wholly owned subsidiaries of Level 3 Communications, Inc. Any other service names, product names, company names or logos included herein are the trademarks or service marks of their respective owners. Forward-Looking Statement Some of the statements made in this press release are forward looking in nature. These statements are based on management`s current expectations or beliefs. These forward looking statements are not a guarantee of performance and are subject to a number of uncertainties and other factors, many of which are outside Level 3`s control, which could cause actual events to differ materially from those expressed or implied by the statements. The most important factors that could prevent Level 3 from achieving its stated goals include, but are not limited to, the current uncertainty in the global financial markets and the global economy; disruptions in the financial markets that could affect Level 3`s ability to obtain additional financing; as well as the company`s ability to: increase and maintain the volume of traffic on the network; successfully integrate acquisitions; develop effective business support systems; defend intellectual property and proprietary rights; manage system and network failures or disruptions; develop new services that meet customer demands and generate acceptable margins; adapt to rapid technological changes that lead to further competition; attract and retain qualified management and other personnel; and meet all of the terms and conditions of debt obligations. Additional information concerning these and other important factors can be found within Level 3`s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Statements in this press release should be evaluated in light of these important factors. Level 3 is under no obligation to, and expressly disclaims any such obligation to, update or alter its forward-looking statements, whether as a result of new information, future events, or otherwise. Level 3 Communications, Inc. Alexis Hammack, 720-888-2441 (Media) Mark Stoutenberg, 720-888-2518 (Investors) Copyright Business Wire 2010

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Level 3 collabora con SXSW per il primo streaming in diretta in assoluto del programma BizSpark Accelerator Microsoft
entry.body: Level 3 fornirà servizi Vyvx e CDN nel corso del Festival interattivo SXSW BROOMFIELD, Colorado--(Business Wire)-- Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ:LVLT) ha annunciato oggi che fornirà il primo streaming in diretta in assoluto di un evento SXSW- il BizSpark Accelerator Microsoft - il 15 e 16 marzo p.v. Utilizzando i servizi di trasmissione Vyvx Level 3 e la rete per la consegna di contenuti (CDN) Level 3, la società trasmetterà l'evento per la visione dal vivo e su richiesta sul sito web SXSW. A partire dalla mattina del 15 marzo, Level 3 si connetterà con l`evento Accelerator all'Hilton Austin Downtown, consegnerà il contenuto sul CDN di Level 3 e trasmetterà l'evento usando i servizi informatici internet (IIS) di Microsoft Smooth Streaming e Microsoft Silverlight. Sarà disponibile un link allo streaming all'indirizzo http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. "Level 3 crede fortemente nell'importanza dell'innovazione tecnologica, quindi lavorare con SXSW e Microsoft su un evento mirato a sensibilizzare sui nuovi prodotti e servizi è stato il modo ideale per sostenere tale convinzione mettendo in mostra la potenza dei servizi Vyvx e CDN di Level 3," ha dichiarato Peter Neill, Vicepresidente senior di Content Markets presso Level 3. "Fornendo un'esperienza interattiva di alta qualità per il pubblico online globale, aiuteremo ad ampliare la portata di questo evento e incentiveremo una comunità più ampia alla condivisione delle idee." Da oltre 20 anni, i servizi Vyvx di Level 3 hanno trasportato contenuto di trasmissioni "mission critical" ai media globali, ai clienti nel settore pubblicitario e intrattenimento. La tecnologia Vyvx di Level 3, combinata con la portata del protocollo internet backbone di Level 3 e le capacità della sua piattaforma CDN, posiziona la società per fornire autentiche soluzioni end-to-end ai clienti, prendendo il loro contenuto dalla sua creazione al consumo. "Il nostro lavoro con Level 3 aiuterà a portare l'Accelerator a un pubblico interamente nuovo- una prospettiva entusiasmante sia per SXSW che per i partecipanti alla competizione di quest'anno," ha dichiarato Katie King, Vendite interattive presso SXSW. "Siamo consapevoli dei forti precedenti di Level 3 nel fornire eventi in diretta e confidiamo nella loro abilità nel fornire un'esperienza di visione online superiore." Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator al SXSW, una competizione di due giorni che si tiene durante SXSW Interactive, ha lo scopo di dare alle società l'opportunità di presentare tecnologie, prodotti o servizi pionieristici o emergenti a una folla di leader del settore. SXSW Interactive sarà caratterizzato da cinque giorni di presentazioni da parte delle menti più brillanti nella tecnologia emergente, eventi di networking ospitati da leader dell'industria e uno schieramento di programmi speciali che presentano nuovi siti web, videogiochi e idee per l'avviamento. Per maggiori informazioni sui servizi Vyvx e CDN di Level 3, si prega di visitare www.level3delivers.com. Per conoscere meglio SXSW e Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator, si prega di visitare www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. Informazioni su Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ : LVLT) è un importante fornitore operante a livello internazionale di servizi per la comunicazione basati su fibra ottica. Aziende, fornitori di contenuti, operatori all'ingrosso ed enti governativi fanno affidamento su Level 3 per la fornitura di servizi con una combinazione leader del settore di scalabilità e valore tramite una rete end-to-end in fibra ottica. Level 3 offre un portafoglio di servizi metropolitani e a lunga distanza, comprendenti trasporto, traffico dati, Internet, trasmissione di contenuti e traffico voce. Per ulteriori informazioni si prega di visitare il sito Web www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. Tutti i diritti riservati. Level 3, Vyvx, "from creation to consumption", Level 3 Communications e il logo di Level 3 Communications sono marchi di servizio registrati o marchi di servizio di Level 3 Communications, LLC e/o di una delle relative consociate negli Stati Uniti e/o in altri Paesi. I servizi di Level 3 sono forniti da consociate interamente controllate di Level 3 Communications, Inc. Tutti gli altri nomi di servizi, nomi di prodotti, denominazioni sociali o loghi quivi contenuti sono marchi commerciali o marchi di servizio dei rispettivi titolari. Dichiarazioni di previsione Alcune delle dichiarazioni riportate nel presente comunicato stampa costituiscono dichiarazioni di previsione. Siffatte dichiarazioni sono basate sulle aspettative e i pareri correnti dei vertici amministrativi aziendali. Le suddette dichiarazioni di previsione non costituiscono una garanzia della performance e sono soggette a una serie di incertezze e altri fattori, molti dei quali esulano dal controllo di Level 3, e in considerazione dei quali gli eventi effettivi potrebbero discostarsi in maniera sostanziale da quelli espressi esplicitamente o implicitamente in siffatte dichiarazioni. I fattori più importanti che potrebbero impedire a Level 3 di raggiungere gli obiettivi dichiarati comprendono, ma non in senso restrittivo, l`attuale precarietà dei mercati finanziari a livello mondiale e dell`economia globale; cambiamenti a carico dei mercati finanziari che potrebbero intaccare la capacità di Level 3 di ottenere ulteriori finanziamenti; nonché la capacità della società di: integrare efficacemente le acquisizioni; accrescere il volume del traffico sulla rete; difendere la proprietà intellettuale e i diritti di proprietà; sviluppare sistemi di supporto aziendali efficaci; gestire le interruzioni o avarie a carico di reti e sistemi; sviluppare nuovi servizi che soddisfino la domanda dei clienti e generare margini di profitto accettabili; attirare e mantenere personale dirigenziale e altro personale qualificato; e adempire a tutti i termini e condizioni dei propri oneri debitori. Ulteriori informazioni in merito a questi e ad altri fattori importanti sono rinvenibili nei documenti depositati da Level 3 presso la Securities and Exchange Commission. Le dichiarazioni contenute nel presente comunicato stampa vanno vagliate tenendo in debita considerazione gli importanti fattori di cui sopra. Level 3 non si assume alcun obbligo, e declina espressamente qualsiasi obbligo, rispetto all`aggiornamento o alla revisione di una qualsiasi dichiarazione di previsione, sia alla luce della disponibilità di nuove informazioni che del verificarsi di eventi futuri o per qualsiasi altro motivo. Il testo originale del presente annuncio, redatto nella lingua di partenza, è la versione ufficiale che fa fede. Le traduzioni sono offerte unicamente per comodità del lettore e devono rinviare al testo in lingua originale, che è l'unico giuridicamente valido. Level 3 Communications, Inc. entry.author: None
entry.headline: Level 3 geht Partnerschaft mit SXSW ein, um den allerersten Live-Stream des „BizSpark Accelerator Program" von Microsoft bereitzustellen
entry.body: Level 3 liefert während des SXSW Interactive Festivals Services für Vyvx und CDN BROOMFIELD, Colorado--(Business Wire)-- Level 3 Communications Inc. (NASDAQ: LVLT) hat heute bekannt gegeben, dass es den allerersten Live-Stream eines SXSW-Events - des BizSpark Accelerator von Microsoft am 15. und 16. März - bereitstellen wird. Das Unternehmen wird das Ereignis unter Nutzung des Vyvx-Sendeservice und des Content Delivery Network (CDN) von Level 3 live und On-Demand auf der Website von SXSW streamen. Level 3 wird den Feed von der Accelerator-Veranstaltung im Hilton Austin Downtown beginnend am Morgen des 15. März aufnehmen, den Content über das CDN von Level 3 ausliefern und das Ereignis unter Nutzung von Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) Smooth Streaming und Microsoft Silverlight übertragen. Ein Link zum Stream findet sich unter http://sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. „Level 3 glaubt fest an die Wichtigkeit technologischer Innovation. Deswegen ist die Arbeit mit SXSW und Microsoft bei einer Veranstaltung, deren Ziel es ist, das Bewusstsein für neue Produkte und Dienste zu heben, ein idealer Weg, um diese Überzeugung zu stützen und gleichzeitig die Leistungsfähigkeit der Dienste Vyvx und CDN von Level 3 zu zeigen", sagte Peter Neill, leitender Vizepräsident für Contentmärkte bei Level 3. „Indem wir einem weltweiten Onlinepublikum ein interaktives Erlebnis in höchster Qualität bieten, helfen wir dabei, die Größenordnung der Veranstaltung zu heben und eine große Gemeinschaft zu bilden, welche bestimmte Ideen teilt." Vyvx-Dienste von Level 3 helfen seit 20 Jahren dabei, entscheidende Sendeinhalte weltweit zu Kunden aus den Bereichen Medien, Werbung und Unterhaltung zu transportieren. Level 3 ist mit seiner Vyvx-Technologie, zusammen mit der Reichweite seines internationalen Internetprotokoll-Backbones und den Kapazitäten seiner CDN-Plattform in der Lage, Kunden echte End-to-End-Lösungen bereitzustellen. Damit wird Contentlieferung von der Kreation bis zur Nutzung bereitgestellt. „Unsere Zusammenarbeit mit Level 3 wird dazu beitragen, Accelerator einem völlig neuen Publikum zugänglich zu machen. Dies ist für SXSW und die Teilnehmer des diesjährigen Wettbewerbs eine erfreuliche Aussicht", sagte Katie King, vom Bereich Interactive Sales bei SXSW. „Wir kennen die erfolgreiche Geschichte von Level 3 in Bezug auf Übertragung von Live-Events und vertrauen auf ihre Fähigkeit, eine herausragende Onlineübertragung zu ermöglichen." Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator auf dem SXSW ist ein zweitägiger Wettbewerb im Rahmen von SXSW Interactive. Ziel ist es, Unternehmen die Möglichkeit zu eröffnen, einem Publikum aus Führungskräften der Branche bahnbrechende oder neu entstehende Technologien, Produkte oder Dienste zu präsentieren. SXSW Interactive bietet fünf Tage lang Präsentationen von einigen der hellsten Köpfe aus dem Bereich der neuesten Technologien, Networking-Events von Branchenführern sowie eine Reihe von besonderen Programmpunkten, die neue Websites, Videospiele und Startup-Ideen präsentieren. Weitere Informationen über Vyvx- und CDN-Dienste von Level 3 finden Sie unter www.level3delivers.com. Weitere Informationen über das SXSW und Microsoft BizSpark Accelerator finden Sie unter www.sxsw.com/interactive/accelerator. Über Level 3 Communications Level 3 Communications Inc. (NASDAQ: LVLT) ist ein führender internationaler Lieferant von Kommunikationsdiensten auf Glasfaserbasis. Zu den Kunden von Level 3 gehören Firmen, Content-Anbieter, der Großhandel sowie Behörden: Sie alle verlassen sich auf die Dienstleistungen des Unternehmens, das über sein durchgehendes Glasfasernetz eine branchenführende Kombination aus Skalierbarkeit und Werthaltigkeit bietet. Level 3 verfügt über eine breite Palette von Dienstleistungen für den Großstadt- und Langstreckenbereich, einschließlich Transport, Daten, Internet, Content-Lieferung und Sprachdienste. Weitere Information finden Sie unter www.Level3.com. © Level 3 Communications, LLC. Alle Rechte vorbehalten. Level 3, Vyvx , „From Creation to Consumption", Level 3 Communications und das Logo von Level 3 Communications sind eingetragene Dienstleistungsmarken oder Dienstleistungsmarken von Level 3 Communications LLC und/oder eines ihm unterstehenden Unternehmens in den USA und/oder anderen Ländern. Dienste von Level 3 werden von hundertprozentigen Tochtergesellschaften von Level 3 Communications Inc zur Verfügung gestellt. Sämtliche anderen Namen von Firmen, Dienstleistungen, Produkten oder Logos sind Handelsmarken oder Dienstleistungsmarken ihrer jeweiligen Eigentümer.
